page.description: Remove a key of a value.

argument.name: name
argument.description: The key value of an entry in a StringDictionary list.

page.discussion: The .REMOVE() method removes an entry from a StringDictionary list.
page.example: dim sd as StringDictionary sd.set("abc", "3") ? sd.exists("abc") = .T. sd.remove("abc") ? sd.exists("abc") = .F.
